console.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
console.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: No one could console her when Peter died.
She consoled herself with the fact that no one else had done well in the exam either.
He consoled himself that he would see Kate again soon.
console.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc
console.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a special cupboard for a television, computer etc
